Tim Gettys reacts to the latest Marvel movie trailer, Nick Scarpino wonders if we will ever burn out talking about stuff, Colin Moriarty wants to know what the greatest video game controller of all-time is, and Greg Miller discusses ideas we have for shows we want to make. (Released 01.09.15)

Each and every Friday, Greg Miller, Colin Moriarty, Nick Scarpino, and Tim Gettys get together to talk. Each podcaster brings a topic to the table, and then, they go. TV, space, books, movies -- anything goes.
